Ignacio Guerra Canamar

Family History

Ignacio Guerra Canamar was born in Mexico City on the 6th of November in the year of 1633. In his will, he listed his parents as Capitan Antonio Guerra Canamar and Dona Lucia Fernandez de Rio Frio. Ignacio married Maria de la Garza, the daughter of Juan Cavazos and Elena de la Garza in his first marriage and Catarina Fernandez, the daughter of Capitan Gregorio Fernandez and Beatriz Gonzalez, in his second marriage. He listed children of the first marriage with Maria de la Garza as follows:
